title: Mom / Monika
name: Mom / Monika
description:
A Map by Ccampbell

This map shows the life travels of Monika Campbell, 1941-2006.

properties.name: Albersweiler
properties.description: Posted by Ccampbell1958: Monika graduate business vocational school and works dental assistant apprenticeship for 2-3 years; then moves to Stuttgart

properties.name: Annweiler church
properties.description: Posted by Ccampbell(approximate location; this looks like a church in the satellite view) Aug 1965: church wedding ceremony in Annweiler; presided by priest Lehmann in Europe for 2 weeks total including trips to Faak-am-Faakersee, Innsbruck, Munich and Bremerhaven

properties.name: Annweiler house
properties.description: Posted by CcampbellJun 1951: Waldfriedenstrasse house construction complete; built by Walter\'s employer; duplex shared with another company family 1956: Monika starts going to business vocational school in Landau

properties.name: Bremerhaven
properties.description: Posted by CcampbellAug 1965: after honeymoon, driven up to Bremen / Bremerhaven (by Opi?) to take SS Bremen to New York

properties.name: Faak am Faarkersee
properties.description: Posted by CcampbellAug 1965: honeymoon phase 1

properties.name: Feldbergen
properties.description: Posted by CcampbellApr 1945: arrived from Hildesheim Oct-Dec 1945: brother Manfred born and died Summer 1948: Monika hospitalized with tonsilitis / strep / rheumatic fever; no penicillin available to properly treat it Jun 1951: family departed for Annweiler

properties.name: Groemitz
properties.description: Posted by CcampbellFeb 1945: stayed in small hotel here after boat arrived in Luebeck; no heat; Walter Conrad joined them after about two weeks, and they moved on to Hildesheim (Walter\'s hometown).

properties.name: Hildesheim
properties.description: Posted by CcampbellFeb 1945: arrived at paternal grandfather Wilhelm\'s home in Hildesheim; exact location unknown. War bombing had destroyed over 80% of the city. Family moved to Feldbergen (village east of Hildesheim) in Apr 1945. After bringing the family to Hildesheim, Walter returned to work with the metal products company (relocated from Koenigsberg to Altenburg, near Leipzig), then fled to Austria, and finally returned to Feldbergen in Sep 1945.

properties.name: Innsbruck
properties.description: Posted by CcampbellAug 1965: honeymoon phase 2

properties.name: Konigsberg (1941-1945)
properties.description: Posted by CcampbellBorn here in Sep 1941; exact location not known Walter Conrad was a civil engineer at a metal products firm Family fled in late Jan 1945 as the Russian Red army approached Car was driven to nearby port of Pillau to catch a ship, however that car was confiscated enroute. They then were carried by a horse-drawn sled/wagon the rest of the way to Pillau. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/German_exodus_from_Eastern_Europe

properties.name: Lambertville house
properties.description: Posted by Ccampbell1985: land purchased and house construction contracted Oct 1986: moves in with Julienne 1999: trip to Ireland with Renate Sep 2001: trip to Alaskan coast with Jennifer and Julienne

properties.name: Landau
properties.description: Posted by Ccampbell1956: Monika goes to business vocational school; meets Christiane Bilabel; Renate is ill and in boarding school; graduates in 1958

properties.name: Luebeck
properties.description: Posted by CcampbellFeb 1945: fleeing from Koenigsberg, arrived at port of Luebeck; went to just north to Groemitz and a short hotel stay

properties.name: Martinsville house
properties.description: Posted by Ccampbellpurchased and moved in in summer 1972 1974: ski trip to Hofgastein with Gebauer family Nov 1976: Julienne born 1980: trip to Germany including Gebauer family home in Ampfing 1980-1982: trips to Switzerland, Berlin, Paris, Cap d\'Antibes summer 1984: Christopher leaves for Lawrencville and then Georgia Tech 1985: wins trip to Italy from a cosmetic company (filled out a card at a counter while shopping); goes to Montecatini Terme, near Florence / Firenze summer 1986: Jennifer leaves for a year in Germany and then U of Maryland Oct 1986: house sold, moves to Lambertville with Julienne

properties.name: Munich
properties.description: Posted by CcampbellAug 1965: honeymoon phase 3; stayed at Hotel Vier Jahreszeiten, which is the exact location indicated here; then back to Annweiler?

properties.name: NYC city hall
properties.description: Posted by CcampbellJune 1965: civil wedding ceremony; witnessed by Renate and Marvin Pinn

properties.name: NYC job (1964)
properties.description: Posted by Ccampbell1964: worked as a dental hygienist at an office at "Madison and the 60\'s"; visits Dr. Herbert Marcus who send her to Cardiologist Burack who properly diagnoses heart problem (mitral prolapse).

properties.name: New York City (1963)
properties.description: Posted by Ccampbell1963: arrived by ship (USS What? from where?); driven down to Florida by Stefan\'s father

properties.name: New York City (1964)
properties.description: Posted by Ccampbell1964: moved up from Florida; had apartment in Queens with 3 other girls; worked as dental assistant in Manhattan

properties.name: New York City (1965)
properties.description: Posted by CcampbellAug 1965: returned from Germany; picked up by Marvin Pinn

properties.name: Pahokee FL
properties.description: Posted by Ccampbellpahokee fl1963: arrives here from New York after transatlantic trip; driven down by Stefan\'s father; sponsored by Traudl and John; gets job as a pediatric aide in hospital (not dental, not licensed for U.S. dental work) 1964: leaves for NYC

properties.name: Pillau (1945)
properties.description: Posted by CcampbellSeaport for Konigsberg; first tried to get onto the ship "Wilhelm Gustlof", but they missed it due to car getting confiscated enroute; it sunk a few days later taking nearly 10,000 fleeing refugees with it. Boarded ship (either "Salzburg" or "Stuttgart") and sailed across the Baltic sea to Luebeck. http://www.skovheim.org/worldwide/baltic/gustlof/wgustlof.htm

properties.name: Plainfield apt
properties.description: Posted by CcampbellAug 1965: moves into OAC\'s apartment on Crescent Avenue in Plainfield; OAC is practicing in a room in 721 Park Ave

properties.name: Plainfield house
properties.description: Posted by Ccampbell721 Park Avenue fall of 1965: purchased by OAC summer 1966: nanny, daughter of OAC patient Aug 1966: Christopher born July 1967: riots in Plainfield, Newark and Detriot Aug 1968: Jennifer born 1968-1969: Brigitte (from Paris), met through Jacobsens (they had a 2 piano house) 1969-1971: Isolde is au pair girl, via Christiane Bilabel Summer 1972: moved to Martinsville

properties.name: Plainfield house
properties.description: Posted by Ccampbell

properties.name: Seton Hall University
properties.description: Posted by Ccampbell1968-1970: attended Seton Hall dental school then went to work for Boyd Allen

properties.name: St. Patrick's Cathedral
properties.description: Posted by CcampbellJuly 1965: baptised and confirmed as a Catholic

properties.name: Stuttgart
properties.description: Posted by Ccampbell1960-1961: works for American dentist Dr. Hoffman (Renate says he was "ugly and mean"); gets a new job at American hospital in nearby Vaihingin

properties.name: Vaihingin
properties.description: Posted by Ccampbell1961-1963: works for American hospital (not sure if it\'s the one indicated here); works for Marvin Pinn and trained as a dental hygienist 1963 takes ship (USS what? from where?) to New York

properties.name: Warren
properties.description: Posted by Ccampbellworked for: Boyd Allen in Warren Larry Fraze in _____ Miele in 1986 (periodontist in Princeton?) Frank _____ in Clinton Robert Bowden in Flemington

properties.name: duCret School of Art
properties.description: Posted by Ccampbell  attended circa 1982 met Andrea Ruebcke-Siegel

properties.name: engaged to OAC
properties.description: Posted by CcampbellDec 1964; diamond engagement ring bought on Canal Street

properties.name: meets OAC
properties.description: Posted by CcampbellSpring 1964; somewhere in NYC!
